auditorium

Class Bugout

  • java.lang.Object
    • auditorium.Bugout

  • public class Bugout
extends java.lang.Object
    This class contains debugging output messages (which might, someday, get turned into logs).

    • Field Summary

      static boolean MSG_OUTPUT_ON
      Clear this field to disable debugging messages.
